summary: Upgrade audit log infrastructure to support GDPR v2 right-to-erasure (RtE) compliance. Key changes include: restructuring logs with user-specific metadata and personal/operational data classification; implementing automated RtE workflows with full deletion and partial redaction modes; adding cryptographic integrity checks and tamper-evident meta-logging; handling edge cases like multi-user logs and legal retention conflicts; building compliance dashboards and reporting; ensuring no performance degradation during peak loads. Deliverables include updated schemas, APIs, migration guides, and training materials. Requires coordination with Legal, Security, and Compliance teams.
